 <description>Healthcare IT News is the industry’s authoritative source covering the people, policy and technology driving next-generation healthcare in the U.S. For more than 12 years, it has been the voice of health IT, delivering editorial insights about compelling topics such as electronic health records, health information exchange, privacy and security, data analytics, patient engagement, population health and revenue cycle management.</description>

 <item> <title>HHS plan for the opioid crisis: Track prescribing patterns with Medicaid data</title>
 <link>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/hhs-plan-opioid-crisis-track-prescribing-patterns-medicaid-data</link>
 <description>As part of its FY19 budget request, the agency is looking into how to leverage PDMPs to track prescribing histories, as well as reporting suspected abuse to the DEA.
</description>
 <author>Jessica Davis</author>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/government">Government &amp; Policy</category>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/pharmacy">Pharmacy</category>

 <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 16:14:10 -0500</pubDate>
 <source url="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/home/feed">News from healthcareitnews.com</source>
</item>
 <item> <title>Boston Children's builds dashboard to better manage patient capacity and beds</title>
 <link>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/boston-childrens-builds-dashboard-better-manage-patient-capacity-and-beds</link>
 <description>The hospital has outstripped its physical footprint, so analytics for patient placement has become critical while it awaits new buildings.
</description>

 <item> <title>House balks at $10 billion price tag for VA-Cerner EHR project</title>
 <link>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/house-balks-10-billion-price-tag-va-cerner-ehr-project</link>
 <description>VA Committee Chair Phil Roe was also concerned that the amount doesn’t cover maintenance or the cost to update the infrastructure necessary to accommodate the new platform.
</description>

 <item> <title>To reach value realization, start right – A 10-point plan</title>

 <item> <title>Tapping real-time analytics to create a digitally enabled organization</title>

 <description>As a society, we can and are collecting data in many ways. The question is not how to get more data, but how to use it effectively?

 <item> <title>Do's and don'ts of building a population health program doctors love</title>
